text: Change is afoot when Netflix ’ s hit period drama “ The Crown ” returns for a second season. Not only will there be a changing of the guard at the end of the 10 new episodes, as Season 2 is both Claire Foy and Matt Smith ’ s final seasons playing Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, respectively, but also there will be new settings and relationships within the story. To begin with, Philip takes a five - month journey to faraway lands to be the royal face at events like the Olympic Games, which will move much of the story out of the confines of Buckingham Palace, while Princess Margaret ( Vanessa Kirby ) balks at the constraints of royal expectations and finds a new love in photographer Antony Armstrong - Jones, better known as Lord Snowdon ( Matthew Goode ). “ The family explode
